title: Weave Type Taxonomy
description: Classifies the source format of a user's input 'Weave'.

nodes.label: Text
nodes.description: Plain text input from a user.
nodes.embedding_context: Written text, typed words, sentences, paragraphs, journal entry, note.

nodes.label: Audio
nodes.description: An audio recording from a user.
nodes.embedding_context: Spoken words, voice recording, sound, audio clip, voice memo, dictation.

nodes.label: Image
nodes.description: An image file provided by a user.
nodes.embedding_context: Photograph, picture, drawing, screenshot, visual still, photo.

nodes.label: Document
nodes.description: A structured document like a PDF or Word file.
nodes.embedding_context: Document, PDF, Word document, file, report, structured text.

nodes.label: System Event
nodes.description: An event generated by an integrated system (e.g., calendar, health app).
nodes.embedding_context: System event, API data, integration, automated log, calendar event, health data.
